desc: Firstly, thank you for taken the time to read this brief. We @ WebTronic believe we have the right fit for SME business and with your help feel that we have the right solution for the customer.BackgroundOur company was created to answer a growing call in the industry: how do SMEs get to the next level when their budgets are often so restrictive? Even when a business is thriving in its early years, the marketing budget doesn’t magically quadruple itself overnight. Profits usually go straight back into the business: buying more stock, recruiting new staff or upgrading failing systems. Although we know that branding, marketing and a strong digital presence should be top of the list from day one, the truth is that it doesn’t always work that way. At WebTronic, we thrive on making great things happen. Our company was created to answer a growing call in the industry: how do SMEs get to the next level when their budgets are often so restrictive?There Must Be ANOTHER WAY?We decided we wanted to help by creating another option. A better option. The entire WebTronic team has a deep interest in supporting local businesses and helping them reach their next natural level. And we know that building a great online presence isn’t a desirable step on that journey – it’s a critical one.We pooled experience (five, and counting) and worked out a range of web design packages that would suit almost any budget. But, unlike many other affordable design options, our ethics wouldn’t let us compromise on quality at any point. We’re firm believers that you can build something great without doing away with any vital foundations. You just have to get creative.When you work with WebTronic, you’ll be tapping into almost 50 years’ worth of experience, skill, knowledge and expertise bundled into one affordable package. Even if you opt for our entry-level package, your project will be infused with all that talent and of course all that passion.ObjectiveThis is where you come into the picture. We need people like you to spread the great news that there is someone out there that can help business get online hassle free. We are not a build it and run business. The idea is to grow your online presence as your business grows.Target AudienceSo who are you looking to approach? SME businesses are any company with less than 250 employees. What if they are bigger than 250 employees? Don’t worry we work with our sister company Purple Motion, who can build full custom bespoke websites.PromiseOur promise to you as a sales person is an easy sell with a great bonus structure. Each website you sell you will earn BIG!Upfront Cost to the client.•	£250 Website = You Get £100 commission•	£350 - £500 Website = You Get £150 Commission•	£600 - £1000 Website = You Get £200 Commission•	£2000 – Unlimited = You Get 20% commission of final cost to the client.•	Any other marketing items you will earn 15% on the final invoice amount (Ex VAT)Support for Your PromiseWe won’t just leave you to it. We want to work with you to help you sell the right product to the client. This is why we have a simple document to make sure that all aspects are documented. This means when we start building the product we & the client understand what they are expecting. If you have any questions ask. The last thing we want is something not being covered. Forms are included in your starter pack.Key MessageWhat we want to get over to the client.•	A WEBTRONIC WEBSITE IS AFFORDABLE•	WITH WEBTRONIC, IT’S ALL INCLUDED•	WE CAN GROW WHAT YOU NEED OUT OF A WEBSITE WITH YOU•	WE KNOW GOOD DESIGN•	OUR BUSSINESS IS BUILT ON EXPERIENCE
title: Sell something for me

desc: Hello,Please read the full details of the job before responding.So I currently have 3-4 different sites where I need assistance with the following:-	Website management (e-commerce site, wordpress platform theme)-	SEO services “strategies & management” to make sure we are maximizing organic traffic-	Digital marketing campaigns: where most of the items are set up just need to manage and maximize ROIo	Tools we use♣	Mailchimp - for email marketing and new customer campaigns♣	Unbounce – for landing pages♣	Facebook ads manager- setup campaigns and retarget using pixel♣	Standard Google tools – such as analytics, tag manager, keyword planner etc.-	Someone who has wealth of knowledge and experience in effective ROI and conversions to maximize profits using SEO, Digital marketing and social media!Based on my experience with last individual I had, this is 10-20 hour/week job. Therefore its best toe setup a set monthly salary. Last person I was paying salary plus bonus $50 per month plus bonus that can range from $100 - $500 per month. Here is how it works, the base is for you to focus on standard tasks such as maintaining website, seo etc. The bonus is setup for digital marketing based on conversion as this will keep you motived and make you a chance to earn more and this way I know I am getting your best work.Here is what I am looking for:-	Someone with good knowledge of Digital marketing, website management and seo-	Someone who is passionate about ROI and conversion (remember we both make money this way, so everyone wins)-	Someone who is thinks outside of the box meaning thinking new ways to maximize profits.Here is what I am not looking for:-	Someone who will put in minimum effort and expect high return (not a good business model for you or me)-	 Someone who only has basic experience with SEO and Digital marketingHopefully you have read all the details, if you are still interested let me know so can make this a profitable journey for both of us.ThanksMikel
